title: BRIEF-Metro Mining Qtrly Total Bauxite Production 1,420K Wet Metric Tonnes
text:
BRIEF-Metro Mining Qtrly Total Bauxite Production 1,420K Wet Metric Tonnes

Commodities 12 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 11:35)

BRIEF-Metro Mining Qtrly Total Bauxite Production 1,420K Wet Metric Tonnes Oct 28 (Reuters) - Metro Mining Ltd : * METRO MINING LTD - TOTAL BAUXITE PRODUCTION FOR SEPT QUARTER WAS 1,420K WET METRIC TONNES WITH 1,415K WMT SHIPPED * METRO MINING LTD - REMAINS ON TRACK TO MEET ITS 2019 PRODUCTION AND SHIPPING GUIDANCE OF 3.3-3.5M WMT * METRO MINING LTD - Q3 SALES REVENUE OF A$79.5M

BRIEF-Metro Mining Qtrly Total Bauxite Production 1,420K Wet Metric Tonnes
